Key Match Events: Richie Berrington sealed the deal with a maximum in the second-last over
Scotland's first T20I victory over Namibia
Post-Match Reflections: Scotland moved to the top of Group B with Namibia victory
Scotland will move above the African nation in the ICC rankings
Miscellaneous Highlights: Namibia won the toss at an overcast but dry Bridgetown
Captain Gerhard Erasmus made the biggest contribution with a powerful 52 from 31 balls
Others: Namibia's now one win, one loss, having claimed a dramatic Super Over win over Oman earlier in the tournament
Group B action continues on June 8, with Australia taking on England in what's an eormous showdown
